description.text:
Notes:
• Only use RealmeUI 3 firmware (C.18)
• Clean flash recommended
• Don't change kernel
• Flash with OFOX recovery.

more.text:
Changelog:
• Based on April security patch & latest QPR2 sources
• Safetynet & CTS pass by default
• New Revolt kernel and upstream to 4.14.340
• Implemented fingerprintd thaw hack from OnePlus 3 (Faster unlocks)
• Fix USB DAC
• Remove unneeded USB functions
• Switch to common USB service
• Build common MediaTek Gadget HAL
• Switch to powerhint and refactor and decrease interaction boost
• Refactor and configure cgroup
• Update IMS from plato
• Fix volume bar
• Switch to prebuilt libwifi-hal and build libwifi-hal-wrapper

description.text: Note: CTS at the moment it only works on these
, in the next posts it will be by default in rom

more.text:
Changelog:
• Updated and synced with latest Lineage 21 sources
• Upstream kernel to 4.14.328 (ASB-2023-11-05_4.14-stable)
• Apply patches for Mali exploit CVE-2022-42703, CVE-2023-21255, CVE-2023-25012
• Reduced logging in the kernel
• Set default hotspot ssid to Realme 8
• Fix UUIDs for AOSP audio pre-processing effects
• Update power_profile from RealmeUI 4.0
• Enable FS-Verity
• Add sf threshold of next vsync prop from Pixel
• Fixed fingerprint on Aod
• Updated ims blobs (Thanx Sanic)

Notes:
• Only use RealmeUI 3 firmware (C.18)
• Flash with OFOX recovery.
